annotations.text: There is a 3-year grace period for the land rent; the rent during this period will be prorated over the remaining years annually, starting at the date of execution of the contract; After that, the annual lease rate per hectare of land will be birr 111, the annual amount of payment will be birr 555,000 and the total amount payable under the contract will be birr 13,875,000.00; There is to be a one-year down payment

Ministry of Agriculture undertakes to provide or cause to be provided special investment privileges such as exemptions from repatriation of capital and profits granted under the investment laws of Ethiopia

Dividing the lease land among shareholders to develop in an independent way or subleasing to any party is strictly forbidden and will result in a termination of the contract; Green Valley Agro can only transfer developed land or properties developed on the land in favor of any other company or individual after 75% of the project land is developed, provided it has Ministry of Agriculture's consent
annotations.category: Restrictions on transactions with affiliated parties

annotations.text: Green Valley Agro must conduct an environmental impact assessment and deliver the report from the assessment within 3 months of the execution of the contract

Green Valley Agro must take good care of and conserve the leased land and natural resources on it; In particular, it must: (a) conserve the tree plantations that have not been cleared for earth works, (b) apply appropriate working methods to prevent soil erosion in sloping areas, (c) observe and implement the entire set of legislation providing for natural resource conservation, and (d) conduct an environmental impact assessment and deliver the report from the assessment within 3 months of the execution of the contract
annotations.category: Protection of environment, harvesting practices (for forestry contracts), prevention of pollution, etc
Right to take and/or use water within/near contract concession area (including fees, licenses, and permits required)

annotations.text: Ministry of Agriculture must arrange access and use of the facilities of the Ethiopian government and the Regional State Research centers for soil testing and mapping with the payment of a fee
Green Valley Agro must submit an advance action plan regarding the use of leased land to Ministry of Agriculture
annotations.category: Feasibility studies and requirement of business plan

annotations.text: Green Valley Agro is expected to start developing the land within 6 months of the date of execution of the contract or from the date that Green Valley Agro receives final clearance from the Ethiopian government, whichever is later; 1/3 of the leased land must be developed within the first year of the contract (or after receiving final clearance) and the entire plot must be developed within 3 years; Green Valley Agro must not make any unauthorized use of the leased land beyond the predetermined purpose, objective or plan as permitted under this contract without the prior written consent of Ministry of Agriculture

Green Valley Agro has the right to build infrastructure such as dams, water boreholes, power houses, irrigation systems, roads, bridges, offices, residential buildings, fuel/power supply stations/outlets health/hospitals/dispensaries, and education facilities at its discretion upon consultation and submission of permit request with concerned offices and subject to the type and size of the investment project

annotations.category: Marketing of output and state access to output

annotations.text: Ministry of Agriculture may monitor and establish that Green Valley Agro is discharging and accomplishing its obligations diligently, provided that this right is exercised and performed in a manner which does not cause any hindrances to the work and activities of Green Valley Agro

Ethiopian government may restore any land which is not developed within 1 year from the date of execution of the contract or receipt of all clearances from the Ethiopian government, whichever is later; Ministry of Agriculture must issue 6 months' notice prior to termination of the contract on the grounds of failure to develop the land within the time limits in accordance with contract obligations, of any damage to the natural resources or of nonperformance of due payment of rent or relevant taxes; In the event of not addressing such an issue, Ministry of Agriculture may extend the time period for such compliance or terminate the contract according to the terms of this contract

annotations.category: Contracting party's permitted use of public or private land outside concession area

annotations.text: Ministry of Agriculture reserves the right to revise or amend the land rent as the need may arise
annotations.category: Other - Reservation of right to revise lease payment rate

annotations.text: The governing law for operations under the contract shall be the laws of Ethiopia
annotations.category: Governing law in case of dispute

annotations.text: In the event of a dispute arising between the Ethiopian government and Green Valley Agro arising out of or in connection with this contract, both parties will do their utmost to resolve the dispute amicably and to their mutual satisfaction and if they are unable to resolve the dispute, it shall be referred to the Ethiopian Federal Court

Unless 75% of the land is developed, Green Valley Agro has no right to transfer the land or the right to use the land and properties to other persons; Upon developing 75% of the land, Green Valley Agro can transfer the developed portion of the land or the properties on the land to other persons only with prior written consent of Ministry of Agriculture

The contract may be terminated upon: (a) the expiration of the term of the contract (b) a failure of Ministry of Agriculture to deliver the land for reasons other than  force majeure, (c) a failure of either party to remedy a breach of its obligations or covenants under the agreement after the expiry of a 6 month notice from the other party to do so, (d) a failure of Green Valley Agro to pay rent and taxes for 2 consecutive years, (e) termination by the government after 6 months notice to Green Valley Agro on the grounds of justified good cause for better socio-economic benefit, or (f) termination by Green Valley Agro upon justified good cause upon giving at least 6 months' notice

Where the contract is terminated by Green Valley Agro for breach by Ministry of Agriculture of its obligations or covenants under the contract, Ministry of Agriculture is to pay Green Valley Agro the value of improvements made by Green Valley Agro on the land at the market price after deducting any dues on account of rentals or taxes; If the contract is terminated by Ministry of Agriculture for Green Valley Agro's failure to settle rent and taxes or breach of obligations or covenants, and after giving at least 6 months' notice, no payment shall be made by Ministry of Agriculture to Green Valley Agro on such termination
All communication and notice required shall be in writing in English or Amharic language

Green Valley Agro shall provide correct data and investment activities reports upon request by Ministry of Agriculture; The government has the right to monitor and establish the fact that Green Valley Agro is discharging and accomplishing its obligations diligently; This monitoring must be done in a manner that does not cause any hindrances to the work and activities of Green Valley Agro
annotations.category: Reporting Requirements and other methods of monitoring compliance
